title: Price and availability details leak for Intelâ€™s Arc desktop GPUs
content:
Intel’s Arc desktop GPUs have been a long time coming, but it looks like we’re getting fairly close to a full launch. A new leak published by Wccftech, citing sources at Intel’s supply chain partners, has shed light on some of the graphics cards in the Intel Arc desktop lineup, including pricing and availability. Similar

The post Price and availability details leak for Intel’s Arc desktop GPUs appeared first on XDA.
description: A new leak has shed some light on the upcoming Intel Arc desktop GPUs, which are expected to launch in a few weeks with competitive prices,
